title: Monday Mini: A Brief History of Chastity Belts
itunes:title: Monday Mini: A Brief History of Chastity Belts
description:
Chastity belts may be one of the most successful jokes of all time. Learn about the history of the chastity belt and their modern counterpart, chastity cages.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
